definitions: the quality or condition of responding to certain stimuli in a sensitive manner

examples.text: the aim of the activity was to develop sensitization to issues of diversity in the classroom

shortDefinitions: quality of responding to certain stimuli

definitions: the action or process of making photographic film sensitive to light

examples.text: too much silver nitrate would cause improper sensitization of the plates placed in it

shortDefinitions: action of making photographic film sensitive to light

definitions: the action or process of making an organism abnormally sensitive to a foreign substance

examples.text: common gut bacteria prevent sensitization to allergens

shortDefinitions: action of making organisms abnormally sensitive to foreign substance
